overview: Adrian's career as a businessman who tries his hand at politics is going well, but the situation at home is inversely proportional. His wife was locked up in the basement because of a mental disorder. His son is in a coma after being involved in a mysterious tragedy which resulted in the loss of other people's lives. As if that wasn't terrible enough, his family begins to be terrorized by a female ghost. The tragedy brings Adrian to flashbacks of the past. Long before achieving success, his life had suffered greatly. When almost giving up, a help appears. Connecting it to a sacred hibiscus tree which apparently did not give all success to Adrian for nothing. Is the destruction of his family a fair price for what Adrian has achieved? Or is there another secret that hasn't been uncovered from his past?
title: Waru
